fields.Title: LAIR / KRAS MAZOV PORTRAIT
fields.Description:
This portrait is covered in cobwebs. You can:
1. Compare to weapons cache.
2. Learn about Mazov.
3. React depending on political persuasion.
4. Speculate about who may have stayed here (foreshadows deserter).

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""Could someone have stopped through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could someone have stopped through here recently?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""Who is K. Mazov?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who is K. Mazov?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. And it looks like some latter..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. And it looks like some latter-day radicals were hiding out here but left a long time ago."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think the purpose of this bunker..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think the purpose of this bunker was to produce propaganda. It would have had radio equipment back then, but that's all been looted."

fields.Title: You: ""Could it be connected to the Mazov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could it be connected to the Mazov bust we found in the student's room?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you wish. At any rate, looks li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you wish. At any rate, looks like some Mazovians were hiding out here but left a long time ago."

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe I should move in here. Seems..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe I should move in here. Seems cozy."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, my amnesiac friend, Mazov is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, my amnesiac friend, Mazov is the father of scientific communism. His theories about economic history greatly influenced -- some would even say *sparked* -- the Antecentennial Revolution."

fields.Title: You: "Wonder: who is K. Mazov?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wonder: who is K. Mazov?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I won't stand in your way -- but o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I won't stand in your way -- but only after we're through with this case."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Kras Mazov (nom de guerre), was an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kras Mazov (nom de guerre), was an economist and a theoretical historian. He was a leading figure in the Graad side of the Turn-of-the-Century Revolution, where he headed the Eleven Day Government. Mazov is considered the father of scientific communism (Mazovian thought or Mazovianism).

fields.Title: Jump to: [krasmazovportraitmainhub]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Half a century? This was probably..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Half a century? This was probably part of the network of defence posts the communards built against the amphibious landing." He looks around.

fields.Title: You: ""Look, Kim! It's Comrade Mazov!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, Kim! It's Comrade Mazov!"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.mazov"]  and  IsKimHere()  and  IsHighestPolitical("communist")  and  Variable["boardwalk.mazov_learned_of_him_in_portrait"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What most people think of as *hist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What most people think of as *history* has a tendency to linger in run-down neighbourhoods. Martinaise being what it is, no one has gone through the trouble of cleaning out the old bunkers."
fields.Alternate1: "We have found a lot of those lately... I guess what most people think of as *history* tends to linger in run-down neighbourhoods. Martinaise being what it is, no one has gone through the trouble of cleaning out the old bunkers."

fields.Title: You: ""It's that Mazov guy. This must hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's that Mazov guy. This must have been the hiding place of some naive leftists."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.mazov"]  and  IsKimHere()  and  IsHighestPolitical("ultraliberal")  and  Variable["boardwalk.mazov_learned_of_him_in_portrait"] == false

fields.Title: Kras Mazov Portrait: "A moustachioed and mutton-chopped m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A moustachioed and mutton-chopped man, amateurishly depicted, gazes at you with sad eyes. A plaque reads: "K. Mazov." There is a spider web in the lower left corner of the portrait.

fields.Title: You: ""Why would someone have a portrait..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why would someone have a portrait like this?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, some radical -- or radicals -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, some radical -- or radicals -- were hiding out here but left a long time ago."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""So... this must have been the hidi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So... this must have been the hiding place of some naive leftists?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like some radical -- or radi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like some radical -- or radicals -- were hiding out here but left a long time ago."

fields.Title: You: ""It's Kras Mazov, the idol of murde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's Kras Mazov, the idol of murdering traitors."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.mazov"]  and  IsKimHere()  and  IsHighestPolitical("revacholian_nationhood")   and  Variable["boardwalk.mazov_learned_of_him_in_portrait"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""So... this must have been the hidi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So... this must have been the hiding place of some antitraditionalist murderers?"

fields.Title: You: ""So his ideas tend to stir up troub..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So his ideas tend to stir up trouble?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Millions of depictions of Mazov ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Millions of depictions of Mazov have been produced. They're not all connected -- besides, that looked like some student. The youths always go for this kind of stuff..."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "A good hiding place for someone who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A good hiding place for someone who's up to no good.

fields.Title: krasmazovportraitmainhub
Jump to: [allthesecacheshub]
You: ""It's Kras Mazov! What a troublemak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's Kras Mazov! What a troublemaker he was."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.mazov"]  and  IsKimHere()  and  IsHighestPolitical("moralist")  and  Variable["boardwalk.mazov_learned_of_him_in_portrait"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, I can see that. Looks like so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I can see that. Looks like some communists were hiding out here. They left a long time ago."

fields.Title: Jump to: [krasmazovportraitmainhub]
You: ""A long time ago? How long?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A long time ago? How long?"

fields.Title: Variable["tc.mazov"]
Variable["tc.mazov"]
!(Variable["tc.mazov"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Looks like some latter-day ra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Looks like some latter-day radicals were hiding out here. They left a long time ago."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean, like Ruby? No. I think w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean, like Ruby? No. I think we've stumbled on a piece of history." He looks at the dust.

fields.Title: You: ""So my comrades were here.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So my comrades were here."

fields.Title: You: "Brush the dust off the portrait."
fields.Dialogue Text: Brush the dust off the portrait.

fields.Title: Kras Mazov Portrait: "Years' worth of dust is shaken off...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Years' worth of dust is shaken off. The full head of hair, matched by an ample moustache and sideburns, look a bit silly.

fields.Title: Shivers: "Someone crouches, heels digging int..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone crouches, heels digging into wet sand. Hands sweep across the sand, grains sticking to the frayed skin of the fingertips. An old man sits on a slab of concrete and taps his fingers against the glass of a scope... you shudder.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The lieutenant does not seem to sha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant does not seem to share your enthusiasm.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Some radical -- or radicals -- wer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some radical -- or radicals -- were hiding out here. They left a long time ago."

fields.Title: allthesecacheshub
You: ""What's this still doing here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's this still doing here?"
fields.Alternate1: "What's with all these secret weapons caches, secret workshops, secret bunkers?"
fields.Alternate2: "What's with all these secret workshops and secret bunkers?"
fields.Alternate3: "What's with all these secret weapons caches and secret bunkers?"

fields.Title: Kras Mazov Portrait: "The man in the portrait looks back..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man in the portrait looks back at you silently. He knows who he is, but he isn't telling.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The lieutenant does not seem to sha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant does not seem to share your enthusiasm.
